org.apache.juneau.assertions

Class CollectionAssertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion
      • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentAssertion<R>
        • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentObjectAssertion<R>
          • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentCollectionAssertion<CollectionAssertion>
            • org.apache.juneau.assertions.CollectionAssertion

  • public class CollectionAssertion
extends FluentCollectionAssertion<CollectionAssertion>
    Used for assertion calls against collections objects.
    Example:

    // Validates the specified list is not empty. assertCollection(myList).isNotEmpty();

    • Constructor Summary
